channel.title: Cache download directly to "C:/"
channel.description: hello guys, i have a (pi) server/client, i wanted to change the download of the cache to go directly to my "C:/".. but i have no idea which .java file to modify, can someone tell me what file and what i need to change?

item.title: Cache download directly to "C:/"
item.dc:creator: @sw3ldn sw3ldn
item.description:
@sw3ldn wrote:

signlink.java go in there and u’ll see something like string=s and u’ll find cache link and just change that
